Authors: Atit Kanti, Atsushi Yamazaki, Hiroko Kawasaki
Title:
Citeromyces cibodasensis sp. nov., a novel yeast species
isolated from leaf litter in Indonesia
Keywords:
Cibodas Botanical Garden, Macropanax dispecmus,Ubiquinone
Q-8
Abstract:
A novel species, was isolated from leaf litter of
Macropanax dispecmus obtained from the Cibodas Botanical Garden, West
Java, Indonesia. Two strains of the species displayed typical
characteristics of the genus Citeromyces. Gene sequences D1/D2 domains
of large subunit (LSU) rDNA, internal transcribed spacer (ITS) including
5.8S rDNA, mitochondrial small-subunit rRNA gene (MtSm), and translation
elongation factor-1α (EF-1α) showed that the strains were separated from
the other four existing species of the genus Citeromyces. Therefore, the
two strains were proposed to be represented a novel species within the
genus Citeromyces, Citeromyces cibodasensis ; the type strain is NBRC
110244T (=InaCCY703T= AK01).
